24 of lace chart each chart row is worked once per needle left hand/thumb from this point forward the palm of the hand needle 1 is worked in stockinette with thumb shaping the back of the hand needle 2 is worked from lace chart repeating row 1 24 needle 1 needle 2 round 1 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 pm kfb kfb work chart row 1 round 2-4 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm k4 work chart row 2-4 round 5 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm kfb k2 kfb work chart row 5 round 6-8 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm k6 work cart row 6-8 round 9 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm kfb k4 kfb work chart row 9 round 10-12 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm k8 work chart row 10-12 round 13 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm kfb k6 kfb work chart row 13 round 14-16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm k10 work chart row 14-16 round 17 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm kfb k8 kfb work chart row 17 round 18-19 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 sm k12 work chart row 18-19 round 20 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 remove marker place next 12 sts on waste yarn and co2 sts work chart row 20 round 21-24 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 work chart row 21-24 follow instructions for twisted rib edging bind off loosely in pattern follow instructions for thumb work twisted rib k1tbl p1 for 3 rounds bind off loosely in pattern this pattern is for private use only it may not be copied sold or otherwise distributed you also cannot sell any items produced in accordance with the instructions contained in this pattern without first contacting the author of the
